sentences.en: a hospital for the chronically ill
Chronically over - reactive immune systems may not, though, be an entirely bad thing.
sentences.cn: 不过, 慢性的过敏反应可能并非完全对人体不利.

sentences.en: Chronically sick pigs often suffer from a partial alopecia characterized by a thinning of the bristles.
sentences.cn: 慢性病猪通常有局部脱毛,特点是鬃毛变稀疏.

sentences.en: Drugs were chronically administered to animals at AM 9:00～11:00 for 21 days.
sentences.cn: 每日上午9:00～11:00灌胃给药,持续21天.

sentences.en: If the intestinal walls are chronically inflamed, lipolysis is disturbed.
sentences.cn: 如果肠壁慢性炎症, 脂解作用被扰乱.

sentences.en: Is my life free enough so that I feel chronically unstressed?
sentences.cn: 我的生活是否自自由在,感到时时的无拘无束?

sentences.en: It is required by law to shut down banks which it regards as chronically short of capital.
sentences.cn: 法律规定资金长期短缺的银行必须关闭。
很多工厂长期人浮于事。

sentences.en: Moreover chronically induced replication is a potential mechanism to promote cancer formation.
sentences.cn: 而且慢性诱导复制是促进癌发生的潜在机制.

sentences.en: Most of them were chronically ill.
sentences.cn: 他们多数人患有慢性病。

sentences.en: Nixon was solitary and chronically suspicious.
sentences.cn: 尼克松为人孤僻,一向疑心很大.

sentences.en: People chronically exposed to chlorine develop some degree of tolerance.
sentences.cn: 人长期接触氯气可以产生某种程度的耐受性.

sentences.en: Portugal a high budget deficit and is chronically uncompetitive.
sentences.cn: 葡萄牙预算赤字水平很高且长期缺乏竞争力.

sentences.en: Research and technology are said to be chronically underfunded.
sentences.cn: 据说为研究和技术方面提供的经费严重不足。

sentences.en: Similarly, any pigment nevus that is chronically irritated should be excised.
sentences.cn: 同样, 凡是经常受慢性刺激的各种色素痣切勿予以切除.

sentences.en: This is largely due to chronically stimulated insulin levels.
sentences.cn: 主因是长期地刺激胰岛素的浓度.
